title: ZipRecruiter Jobs Scraper
description: A fast and lightweight actor to scrape job listings from ZipRecruiter using HTTP and Cheerio.

location.title: Location
location.description: The job location to filter by (e.g., 'New York, NY', 'Remote').

posted_date.title: Date Posted
posted_date.description: Filter jobs by when they were posted.

results_wanted.title: Results Wanted
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of job listings to scrape.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: The maximum number of parallel requests.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Select proxies to be used by the crawler.
